casebody.data:
Dale Thomas WINKLER; and DJ'S Heating Service
v.
NORTH CAROLINA STATE BOARD OF PLUMBING, HEATING & FIRE SPRINKLER CONTRACTORS No. 319PA18 Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 14, 2019 John N. Fountain, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, for NC State Board of Plumbing, Heating & Fire Sprinkler Contractors. Reed N. Fountain, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, for NC State Board of Plumbing, Heating & Fire Sprinkler Contractors. Angela Farag Craddock, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, for NC State Board of Plumbing, Heating & Fire Sprinkler Contractors. Jeffrey P. Gray, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, for Winkler, Dale Thomas, et al. M. Jackson Nichols, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, for NC Board of Architecture & State Board of Chiropractic Examiners. Anna Baird Choi, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, for State Licensing Board for General Contractors. Janet B. Thoren, Attorney at Law, for NC Real Estate Commission.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the conditional petition filed on the 5th of October 2018 by Defendant in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 14th of August 2019."

Therefore the case is docketed as of the date of this order's certification. Briefs of the respective parties shall be submitted to this Court within the times allowed and in the manner provided by Appellate Rule 15(g)(2).
